hf_models.__comment__: For HuggingFace-format models (handled by JC.py). Each key appears in the dropdown list.

My-LLaVA-Model.name: myusername/llava-custom-model
My-LLaVA-Model.description: Example custom Hugging Face model with image captioning capability (LLaVA-based).

My-Phi-Vision.name: myusername/phi-vision-captioner
My-Phi-Vision.description: Optional: a different HF model supporting visual-language tasks.

gguf_models.__comment__: For GGUF-format models (handled by JC_GGUF.py). Each key appears in the GGUF model dropdown.

My-GGUF-Caption-Model.name: myusername/llava-custom-gguf-model/model.gguf
My-GGUF-Caption-Model.description: Example GGUF model file from Hugging Face (must include correct mmproj if needed).

My-Gemma-GGUF.name: mlabonne/gemma-3-27b-it-abliterated-GGUF
My-Gemma-GGUF.description: Example: large GGUF model known to work well with JoyCaption.
